attributes.action: Make safe all sign posts on roundabouts and corners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a driver the danger from people tampering with these signs on roads is ever increasing, the main signs that are problematic are the black and white arrow signs on roundabouts "<<<" these are attached to a round post and can be turned 90 degrees so that one of the ends are facing out into the carrageway and can be clipped with a wing mirror or even fataly hit by a bikers head as he/she leans into the bend, All it takes is a couple of self tapping screws to stop them from twisting.

rejection.details: Please provide a surname on your petition.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
